name: Message structure
description: HL7-defined table specifying the abstract message structure code used in MSH-9.3

values.definition: ADT message structure for admit, visit, transfer events
ADT message structure for patient transfers
ADT message structure for discharge and visit end events
ADT message structure for patient class changes
ADT message structure for patient tracking events
Billing message structure for adding patient accounts
Order message structure for general orders
Observation message structure for unsolicited results
Pharmacy order message structure for medication orders
Scheduling message structure for appointment notifications

notes: Abstract message structure codes define the overall organization of message segments. Used in MSH-9.3 for message structure identification.

vendorVariations.epic: Supports all standard message structures with additional internal structures for specialized workflows
vendorVariations.cerner: Uses standard structures with organization-specific extensions for custom message types
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard implementation with optional local message structure variations
